code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import{INCREASE,DECREASE,DELETE}from'../../../redux/actions/catalogItemsActions';import BasketTableColumns from'../components/BasketTableColumnsComponent';var ConnectedBusketTableColumns=connect(function(state){return{items:state};},function(dispatch){return{onIncrease:function onIncrease(itemId,counter){return dispatch({type:INCREASE.type,payload:{itemId:itemId,counter:counter}});},onDecrease:function onDecrease(itemId,counter){return dispatch({type:DECREASE.type,payload:{itemId:itemId,counter:counter}});},OnDelete:function OnDelete(itemId){return dispatch({type:DELETE.type,payload:{itemId:itemId}});}};})(BasketTableColumns);export default ConnectedBusketTableColumns;
